body.name: SUPRENT Bikini Trimmer Women- Painless Ladies Hair Removal Waterproof Wet & Dry- 2 in 1 Lady Shaver for Pubic Hair & Facial Hair- Cordless Electric Razors with USB-C Rechargeable-Pink
features: 【Quick and Painless】Say goodbye to shaving accidents! Women's Bikini Trimmer is equipped with skin-friendly anti-cut micro-trimming ceramic blades, with R-shaped chamfer design on both sides, prevents hair from pulling and scratching, and protects your egg-like delicate skin. Be the queen of beach sparkle.

【Multiple cutter heads】Suprent womens bikini trimmer equipped with two kinds of cutter heads to meet different needs, which can be used on hands, legs, face, underarms, bikini area. The trimmer blades quickly cover larger areas for a precise bikini line. Stubble Trimmer is designed to easily deal with fine stubble, perfect to solve hair monsters and restore your smooth and delicate skin.

【Wet and dry use】 This electric trimmer for women has an IPX5 waterproof rating, which is very convenient to use and clean. It allows you to use it when your skin is wet, and you can also rinse the head directly with water, and it will be clean in one go.

【Take It Ultra-Portable and Go to the Beach】This USB-C women's electric shaver can provide up to 45 days of ultra-long use with a 2-hour charge. The travel lock prevents your trimmer from accidentally opening while traveling. The attached storage bag can hold all the gadgets, SATY FRESH ON THE GO.
【Built-in LED Light Illuminates Everything】The built-in LED light helps you see everything, even the tiniest hair, ensuring a thorough shave and trim.

productInformation.value: #77,971 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #42 in Women's Bikini Trimmers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No red bumps!
reviews.reviewText: This trimmer has been way better than I expected or could have really even asked for. The size and shape of it are really comfortable in the hand and allow for easily maneuvering around in those hard to reach areas. I haven't had it run out of battery or even start to slow down during a full shaving session. The fact it charges with a USB-C cable instead of some proprietary plug is much appreciated and means I always have a back up from my other devices. i haven't traveled with it, but the locking feature is a good addition to keep from draining battery inside your bag. By far my favorite feature is just how smooth my skin is after shaving while never missing a spot with the built in light. The rotary shaver on the other end has been wonderful for close ups and leaves my skin without those painful red bumps I had come to dread. Overall, I would have no problem suggesting this to a friend or family member, and I'll definitely choose this brand again if I ever need a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The box it came in is super cute and sturdy. It came with a storage pouch which seems very durable. The manual was surprisingly well written and let me know about features I'd never have guessed the trimmer had just on visual examination, like the travel lock feature to keep it from accidentally being turned on. At first glance it didn't look like the head was adjustable, but on closer inspection you can see that the head slides on and you can use the grooves to set it to 3mm, 4.5mm, or 6mm length. I also wasn't expecting the stubble trimmer. My previous trimmer didn't have that and it's a very nice addition. I love that it's rechargeable. There's nothing worse than starting a trim and having the trimmer slow down and/or stop during the process because the batteries ran out of juice. Also, no need to constantly remove batteries to prevent them from corroding! The indicator light flashes when charging and stays lit when it's fully charged, so you know it's done. Rechargeable batteries these days actually have a good life span and I'm hoping that will be the case here, but only time will tell. The trimmer head is removeable for easy cleaning and it comes with some oil, so you can add a drop every few uses to keep it running at it's best. It was not very obvious how to remove the trimmer head for cleaning. The manual showed that it could be and it looked like it maybe slid off, but you actually need to apply pressure near the bottom blade area upward to pop it up and off.I found the indicator light to be surprisingly helpful while trimming in a delicate area!If you are in the market for a trimmer, this is a very nice product that gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars shaver works great and is safe
reviews.reviewText: shave with confidence with the non metal blades, very portable and convenient and easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could be better
reviews.reviewText: Not exactly the easiest thing to use, angles are weird. Too expensive for how it does, make sure you don't expect much cleaness from this. The guard that comes with it is useless, it won't shave like anything when it's on. It's not noisy, but also not very sharp which is good for some areas, but had for others. Overall performance is mid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This gives a good clean shave and it’s nice for keeping everything in order down there. It’s a nice size for being able to travel with and you don’t have to have a big case to carry with you wherever you go. It’s rechargeable and cordless so you don’t have to worry about keeping a cord plugged in. Lovely trimmer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars smooth as a whistle
reviews.reviewText: Bough this for my wife, she loved it especially for the armpit area. The device was easy to use, charge it for about 1hr-2 and will last you about a week depending on how much you use it. add the clip guard before you begin, then simply click the power button and shave away. It provides a close shave with no irritation. It comes with a clip guard, usb charging cable and cleaning brush. To clean just use the brush and brush off excessive hairs/dead skin, enjoy !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Beach Hottie did an excellent job of giving a close, smooth Shave and left my skin feeling very soft.The trimmer itself feels soft and smooth in the hand. It comes with a cord for charging and a spacer. There are two ends, the one end that looks like a regular trimmer and the other end to get a very close shave.I first used the trimmer end and then used the other end to finish and it did a wonderful job that gave me the closest shave I've ever had with an electric trimmer.The trimmer and accessories come with a pouch for storing away and it all comes in a very nice presentation box which would be great for gifting.I feel the Beach Hottie Bikini Trimmer is an excellent value for the money.
